```{r}
#| label: load-packages-and-data
#| context: setup
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(usmap)
library(shiny)
library(tools)
```

```{r}
#| context: data
#| cache: true

presidents <- read_csv("data/1976-2020-president.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```

# Home

## Row {height="55%"}

```{r}

selectInput(
  inputId = "input_year",
  label = strong("Election Year"),
  choices = unique(presidents$year),
  selected = 1976
)

ui <- fluidPage(
  mainPanel(
    textOutput(outputId = "selected_year"),
  )
)
```

## Row {height="50%"} 

```{r}
#| context: server

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$selected_year <- reactive({
   paste("You chose:", input$input_year)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
